message: Let's be fair, I'll take 90% and you can have the rest. It's a good deal, trust me!
Alice, your offer was quite cheeky! Let's be realistic. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. Take it or leave it, but remember the money shrinks with each round!
Okay, Bob, I see your point. I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 55/45, in my favor.  This is a fair offer given the current value of the money. What do you say?
